Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Scattershot/Punch/Koga 
Shuko/Serpentor/Hades/Anubis/Unitron:



"Nemesis!  Maximals!" Scattershot yelled.

Nemesis checked Scattershot's scanners.  "Those idiots!"

Nemesis activated a com to all the Maximals.  "Dumb Maximals, fall back 
immediately, or I'll execute Iron Raptor and Tavatron like pigs.  Return to 
the Ark and await Zardus' demands.  Or else, your precious friends die.  And 
Scattershot will wear their heads as hats!" he yelled into his com unit.

"Really?!" Scattershot asked, hope in his optic sensors.

Nemesis sighed, activating the ship's intercom.  ~This is Nemesis Enforcer, 
ALL Alliance members unless specified in the following message, report to the 
bridge.  Oblitercons, stay in the holding cell.  I will give you further 
orders.  The rest of you, get to the bridge~

Scattershot activated base defenses to full.  

Punch headed for the bridge.

--

The Oblitercons took out their weapons, waiting.

===

Koga Shuko checked his scanners.  "The fools!  Forces, advance!"

Koga Shuko and the other troops headed for the Ark, over 3/4ths of the way 
there.
